select news_seq.nextval from dual
insert into news(news_no, news_title,emp_no,news_content,news_image,news_main) values(#{newsNo},#{newsTitle},20170001,#{newsContent},#{newsImage},#{newsMain})

select newscom_seq.nextval from dual
insert into news_com(com_no,news_no,emp_no,com_content) values(#{comNo},#{newsNo},#{empNo},#{comContent})
mapper.select: select count(*) from news_com where news_no=#{newsNo}
